subject: MELO V2 Priority Decision: Pivot to Admin Invite System

content.decision: Pivot to Admin Invite System P0 blockers
content.rationale: The MELO Master Plan shows P0 Admin Invite tasks are 'Cannot Deploy Without' blockers. Matrix APIs (melo-matrix-2/3) are nice-to-have features but the invite system is blocking production readiness.

new_priority_tasks.title: Create Admin Invites UI page
new_priority_tasks.description: Create app/(main)/(routes)/admin/invites/page.tsx - Admin dashboard to list/manage invites
acceptance_criteria: Page lists all invites with status (active/used/expired)
Page restricted to admin users only

new_priority_tasks.title: Create Invite Modal component
new_priority_tasks.description: Create components/admin/create-invite-modal.tsx for creating new invites
acceptance_criteria: Modal accepts Matrix user ID input

new_priority_tasks.title: Wire isLoginAllowedWithInvite() into login flow
new_priority_tasks.description: Connect existing invite validation function to actual login flow
acceptance_criteria: External users with valid invite can log in
External users without invite get clear error

content.execution_order: melo-p0-1 → melo-p0-2 → melo-p0-3 (can parallelize p0-1 and p0-2)
content.notes: The Matrix moderation/reactions APIs are complete and valuable, but we need the invite system working before we can deploy. Shift focus to P0 blockers.
